Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Well I do have to say I am floored when I think back to how this town evolved.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: We truly owe it all to you.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: There are a few other things around town that were just finished, but I'll let you go find them yourself.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Again, a huge thanks for everything. This is a great community we have here.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: I have a feeling you got a great future ahead of you..
